```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(gridExtra)
library(readr)

normalize <- function(x) {
    return ((x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x)))
}
data_summary <- function(x) {
   m <- mean(x)
   ymin <- m-mad(x)
   ymax <- m+mad(x)
   return(c(y=m,ymin=ymin,ymax=ymax))
}
mean_summary <- function(x) {
   m <- mean(x)
   return(c(y=m))
}
```


# Load and process

```{r, message=FALSE}
# Osc
freq <- "20"

# sigma scan
exp <- "90"
sigmas <- c("1.0e-9", "5.0e-9", "10.0e-9")

results <- NULL
for(sigma in sigmas){
  name <- paste("../data/exp", exp, "_sigma", sigma, ".csv", sep="")
  df <- read_csv(paste(name, sep=","))
  
  df$sigma <- rep(as.numeric(sigma), nrow(df))
  results <- rbind(results, df)
}

# Ref (Z=0)
exp <- "91"
name <- paste("../data/exp", exp, "_d-2e-3_f", freq, ".csv", sep="")
df <- read_csv(paste(name, sep=","))
df$sigma <- rep(0, nrow(df))
results <- rbind(df, results)

# Process
results %>% 
  filter(n_spikes_ref > 0) %>% 
  mutate(delta_spikes = n_spikes - n_spikes_ref) %>% 
  mutate(V_osc = V_osc - V_osc_ref) -> results

rm(df, exp, freq, sigmas, sigma, name)
```

```{r, fig.width=1.9, fig.height=1}
results %>% 
  filter(V_osc/V_comp <= 1) %>% 
  filter(n_spikes >0) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc/V_comp, y=errors*1e3)) +
  geom_point(size=0.01, alpha=0.01) + 
  theme_classic() +
  facet_grid(.~sigma) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 1, alpha=0.7, color="purple", linetype="dashed") +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0.1, alpha=0.5, color="purple", linetype="dashed") +
  # scale_colour_brewer(palette="Greys", guide=guide_legend(nrow=3)) +
  theme(legend.position="bottom") 
```


```{r, fig.width=5.5, fig.height=2.5}
M1 <- mean(filter(results, sigma == 0)$errors*1e3)
max_N <- max(results$N)


results %>% 
  filter(V_osc/V_comp <= 3) %>%
  filter(N %in% sample(1:max_N, 10, replace = FALSE)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=V_osc/V_b, y=errors*1e3, color=factor(delta_spikes))) +
  geom_point(size=1, alpha=1) + 
  facet_grid(sigma~rank) +
  scale_colour_brewer(palette = "Accent", name="Spike count") +
  labs(x=expression(V[o]/V[b]), y="Error (ms)") +
  geom_hline(yintercept = M1, alpha=0.7, color="black") +
  theme_classic() + theme(
    # legend.position="bottom",
    strip.text.x = element_text(size=0),
    strip.background = element_blank(),
    legend.position="right", 
    legend.key.size = unit(.5, "cm"),
    legend.title = element_text(size=8),
    legend.text = element_text(size=8),
    # axis.line=element_blank(),
    # axis.text.x=element_blank(),
    # axis.text.y=element_blank(),
    # axis.ticks=element_blank(),
    # axis.title.x=element_blank(),
    # axis.title.y=element_blank(),
    panel.background=element_blank(),
    # panel.border=element_blank(),
    # panel.grid.major=element_blank(),
    # panel.grid.minor=element_blank(),
    plot.background=element_blank())

rm(max_N, M1)
```
